BH/Blastrage


BH runs into the battle field. HE pulls out 2 semi-automatics. He 
looks at Lino and fires 50 lasers and 3 optic blast.

Blastrage comes into the battle field on the skimmer. He looks around 
and sees snow tech and Shadowcat standing right next to each other. 
"Silly, Silly, bots." Blastrage fires his grenades 10x at him with 3 
opticblast too.
